website_summaries.verdict: The bacon-flavored biscuits are very small, but you get a large amount, making them an awesome value for treating toy breeds.
pros: Fortified with 12 vitamins and minerals, you get a huge amount of biscuits per container
Perfect for small dogs and training
Only 5 calories per Milk-Bone Mini, and it’s an American classic
cons: You’ll have to buy a larger sized Milk-Bone biscuit for bigger dogs

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size for my 8lbs Pomeranian. I needed something small I could bring to the dog park and these are perfect and he loves them. Comes with a lot of treats and it is even sealed.
customer_reviews.author: Tabby

customer_reviews.title: Tiny Biscuits But Great Training Treats!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these Milk-Bone Bacon Dog Treat, Mini Biscuits, 36-Ounce size. I give a few of these to my 2 Australian Cattle Dogs for training treats. These are small Biscuits so I'm OK with giving more than 1. Both of my dogs will chew these, but for medium to large dogs who gobble, gulp and swallow small treats whole, these Biscuits might be too small! For small to tiny dogs, these Biscuits would be perfect! Anyway, both of my dogs love these and I am very happy with them. Now I just wish these would come back in stock!
customer_reviews.author: Ella Belle

customer_reviews.title: Picky Chi Chi turned his nose to a treat!
customer_reviews.text: Okay, my Chi Chi gets so excited when you say the word "treat'. But I bought these.. and started using them as 'treats' for when he went potty outside. It got to the point, that when I said 'treat" he just walked out of the room. Usually he'd bounce at my feet until I tossed it for him to chase. If you have a picky eater.. might want to bypass this. If you have an "eat the sofa cuz it's there' type of eater, by all means.. buy in bulk.
customer_reviews.author: Jeanette Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: I use these dog treat for training my German Shepard to do tricks, they are great for that. Also they are low in calories when using a lot of them for training purposes my dog does not get full with the small treats
customer_reviews.author: wareagle

customer_reviews.title: Tiny Milk-Bones!
customer_reviews.text: These are about an inch long, very tiny! Perfect for Clicker training any size dog, and especially perfect for toy breeds. They do not crumble in my pocket, and a small handful make a nice trail snack. Will buy again when we finish this jar.
customer_reviews.author: Silverstone

customer_reviews.title: Unhappy with Amazon
customer_reviews.text: Sasha doesn't like them. Supposed to be bacon flavored. However, they don't even smell like bacon. Container was dented in and damaged. Have had 2 other previous items damaged but the box it was packed in was fine. Disappointed. Won't purchase again. Have a container of treats she won't eat. Unhappy with Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Lolo

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for tiny dogs!
customer_reviews.text: My puppy loves these treats, but be warned, they are SUPER TINY. Each treat is maybe the length of a quarter. My pup is only 5 pounds so they're perfect for her, but my rottweiler will give me a stern look if I try to pass them off as a real treat for him.
customer_reviews.author: ANONYMOUS

customer_reviews.title: Very small
customer_reviews.text: They weren't my dog's favorite, but the other dogs seem to like them. They are so tiny. Perfect for small dogs or training.
customer_reviews.author: BadWolfGirl

customer_reviews.title: Small treats for little dogs.
customer_reviews.text: We use these small treats to give my dogs treats for the dag .I only give them 10 milk bones per day for treats especially when they listen to our commands.
customer_reviews.author: Donna D

customer_reviews.title: lovely product
customer_reviews.text: we are Milk-Bone big funs. my dogs just love this flavor very much. this big pack bring lots good value on your money. we treat our dog very often by having milk-bone. great one
customer_reviews.author: Jessie Buster

customer_reviews.title: A favorite of my Morkie!
customer_reviews.text: Small, inexpensive treats. Perfect size for my 7-pound Morkie, who loves them!
customer_reviews.author: C. J. Knutson

customer_reviews.title: Wagging tails
customer_reviews.text: These specific Milkbone dog biscuits are hard to find. My two furbabies love them. I'm so happy to have found them.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Bondoni

customer_reviews.title: Small Dog Treats
customer_reviews.text: Nice mini sized dog treats. Their small size is great for dogs with tiny mouths. My dogs love them. Very pleased with my purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My dog loves these as a reward
customer_reviews.text: My dog seems to love the flavor of these. I have been using these to train her (rewards) and she never seems to get tired of them.
customer_reviews.author: mominms

customer_reviews.title: no tantrums. must taste good!
customer_reviews.text: They like it. Its their bedtime snack. They go straight for their kennel without any tantrums. They must taste good to them.
customer_reviews.author: Happy Bird

customer_reviews.title: tasty and only 5 calories each.
customer_reviews.text: Charlie loves treats and these have few calories so he can have more treats and never know he’s watching his weight!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: Can not say to much about flavor but dogs like them as treats. Iuse the trats as rewards when walking them
customer_reviews.author: richard

customer_reviews.title: Miles here:
customer_reviews.text: My name is Miles, mom ordered these for me and I must say they are quite tasty. I will set, stay, and do an up just have one presented to me.
customer_reviews.author: Romagean Personne

customer_reviews.title: Good purchase
customer_reviews.text: Delighted to find these little milk bone. All the stores have them in big barrels for lots more money .
customer_reviews.author: Susan S. Newmark

customer_reviews.title: Great treats for the pups!
customer_reviews.text: My pups love these treats. They are small enough that they can be given during training, but they love them any time.
customer_reviews.author: Judybuys

customer_reviews.title: Too long in a warehouse?
customer_reviews.text: These smell old to me. My dogs usually love Milk-Bone products, but they turned their noses up at these.
customer_reviews.author: Sheri

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: These are cheaper than Walmart and I get it delivered. How can you go wrong. Dog likes them.
customer_reviews.author: Dee Bell

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for training
customer_reviews.text: Obviously I can’t comment on the flavor BUT I’ve been using them to potty train my German Shepherd puppy and he loves them. And they’re the perfect size for training.
customer_reviews.author: Cierra Moore

customer_reviews.title: Our dog wasn't too fond of these
customer_reviews.text: Don't really know about the taste. Our dog will eat them in a pinch, but likes the beef bones better.
customer_reviews.author: Helen

customer_reviews.title: they are two small my dogs did notf like them I have the whole container sittingon my shelf
customer_reviews.text: My dogs did not like them when I offered it to them they took it and spit it out. I did not realize they were so small I wasted my money
customer_reviews.author: AHD

customer_reviews.title: Tiny training treats.
customer_reviews.text: They are extremely tiny. They are more like training treats than an actual Milkbone treat.
customer_reviews.author: Hemennago

customer_reviews.title: OK
customer_reviews.text: My dog wasn't crazy about these and she'll eat just about anything. It's a great value if your dog will eat them.
customer_reviews.author: Dwight K. Schrute

customer_reviews.title: The only treat for my little tiny dogs!
customer_reviews.text: If you you have very small dogs like Chihuahuas they need these tiny milk bones.
customer_reviews.author: M.Q.Patterson

customer_reviews.title: Fresh and smell yummy
customer_reviews.text: These asre cute lottle treats. I use them for training. Maple loves them!
customer_reviews.author: cassandra carpenter

customer_reviews.title: Great Value
customer_reviews.text: My babies love these! They are small and just perfect. Great value too.
customer_reviews.author: TERRY L. JOHNSON

customer_reviews.title: Fast delivery / Great Price
customer_reviews.text: Great price for the amount you get, but they made my dog throw up every time he ate one.
customer_reviews.author: Christy22

customer_reviews.title: Very tasty treats.
customer_reviews.text: The bacon flavor are my dog's favorite. I like the tiny size, so I can give them 2 & they feel like they really got something!
customer_reviews.author: Large Marge

customer_reviews.title: Best little flavored biscuit
customer_reviews.text: My dog just loves these. They are nice and small so he feels he gets more, and he loves the flavor. He wont eat any other kind now.
customer_reviews.author: cherry hardy

customer_reviews.title: Dogs love these bacon treats.
customer_reviews.text: My dogs love these tasty treats. They are small so you get more treats. They like the bacon flavor. They are always excited to get one. I'll be buying more!!!
customer_reviews.author: Suzann

customer_reviews.title: Satisfies a picky dog
customer_reviews.text: My picky dog really likes these and they're small enough to indulge him often.
customer_reviews.author: RevAngieT

customer_reviews.title: Regular flavor a better value.
customer_reviews.text: Having eleven Shih Tzu Show dogs it’s difficult keeping in stock.
customer_reviews.author: Timothy Flanigan

customer_reviews.title: Good Training Treats
customer_reviews.text: These treats are the perfect size for my 6lb, 35lb and 45lb dogs! I use them for training, and these mini treats are perfect in size. They hold their shape well (even if I put them in my pocket or treat bag to take with us on the go!) and my dogs really like them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Dog loves them.
customer_reviews.text: When I offer her one of these there is no hesitation.
customer_reviews.author: James Hermans

customer_reviews.title: the dogs love them
customer_reviews.text: I have two dogs and both of them love these.
customer_reviews.author: Ldsmurf

customer_reviews.title: Tiny
customer_reviews.text: Our dog likes them. She is on a diet so these are perfect for cutting back on treat size
customer_reviews.author: Terri G

customer_reviews.title: Not 4 ALL DOGS!
customer_reviews.text: Only for big dogs.....might be in prime but you can’t return! Waisted money......on bogus claims that said “for all dogs!”
customer_reviews.author: Annette O.

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: Good treats good value but not the best for training. My GSD needs higher value treats.
customer_reviews.author: Navy GSD

customer_reviews.title: Great low calorie treat
customer_reviews.text: I use these for training treats. The dogs love them!
customer_reviews.author: ShopperB

customer_reviews.title: yum?
customer_reviews.text: So my dogs love these...really they should be the ones writing the review...
customer_reviews.author: DaNi Mackeller

customer_reviews.title: GOOD BOY MOJO!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: THIS IS MOJO'S "YOU'RE A GOOD BOY!!" GOODY. HE'S SO FUNNY....HE RUNS INTO HIS CRATE, AND MUNCHIES THE LITTLE BONE. I GUESS HE'S ON HIS TERRITORY THEN. LMAO. HANDS OFF!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: BOBBEE

customer_reviews.title: Yummy
customer_reviews.text: Our pooch is picky but loves these treats. They can easily be broken into small pieces
customer_reviews.author: JMJ

customer_reviews.title: Great Positive Reinforcing tool
customer_reviews.text: Both our dogs love these and they are small so a reward not a meal
customer_reviews.author: Syracuse Pete

customer_reviews.title: My dog loves them!
customer_reviews.text: I used these dog bones for my dog, and he loves them. They;re the only bones I'll feed him. :)
customer_reviews.author: Sherry C.

customer_reviews.title: Can't attest to their healthiness, but my dog likes them.
customer_reviews.text: And I'm impressed that they are only 5 calories each. Which is a big reason my dog is not fat and all the other small dogs in my building are obese. Okay, and they're probably over-fed, too. But this helps!
customer_reviews.author: Lin G.

customer_reviews.title: Tried and failed
customer_reviews.text: My dogs really don't like these , they are spoiled , they love the bigger one's lol.
customer_reviews.author: Granny # 2

customer_reviews.title: Convenient morsels go a long way!
customer_reviews.text: A great little treat to reward good behavior and just because. From our Doxie mix to our Doberman Pinschers they all sit so politely waiting for their little treat!
customer_reviews.author: Lyn

customer_reviews.title: Great food low cal
customer_reviews.text: My 3 dogs love them used 4 treat when come when called
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: Great deal
customer_reviews.text: My dogs love these. For my lab and golden retriever they are kind of small..but perfect size for your pocket on hikes.
customer_reviews.author: Faith

customer_reviews.title: Great treat in size and flavor
customer_reviews.text: Good size for training and not over feeding for special treats. My dog loves them and the crunch is good for his teeth and gums.
customer_reviews.author: Thunderchick

customer_reviews.title: The small size.
customer_reviews.text: These small dog bones are great. We use them for rewards to reinforce our dogs training.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Pretty good for the price, my Huskie likes them and they last a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Ted W. Smith

customer_reviews.title: My dogs love them
customer_reviews.text: Why did Amazon ask me to rate the flavor? I don't eat dog treats.
customer_reviews.author: ken

customer_reviews.title: Just what was ordered
customer_reviews.text: These are not available locally and my dog is an addict!
customer_reviews.author: S Barnhart

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for training and for when puppy goes in her ...
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for training and for when puppy goes in her house. I like the plastic container - she can’t get into it and I have it on top of her cage for easy access. A great product!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazonaholic

customer_reviews.title: Nice size
customer_reviews.text: Love the smaller size. Pets can be treated more often.
customer_reviews.author: Sknmc

customer_reviews.title: Delicious
customer_reviews.text: I don't know why I get upset at the drivers when they bring me such amazing treats.
customer_reviews.author: McAslan

customer_reviews.title: Dogs loved them!
customer_reviews.text: Great training treats. They also are small enough to go inside a treat dispensing ball. Last a long time. Will be buying again.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: My parents' dog wouldn't eat them because she didn't realize they were her favorite bacon bones
customer_reviews.text: I did not realize that these would be tiny little bones. I know it says mini, but these are no bigger than dog food chunks. My parents' dog wouldn't eat them because she didn't realize they were her favorite bacon bones!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Milkbone snacks
customer_reviews.text: Another great snack my dog loved .. will buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Diane Starnes

customer_reviews.title: Snacks in a Jar with a lid
customer_reviews.text: Love the jar with a lid. The dogs love the treat.
customer_reviews.author: Midwest person

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I sent these to my son's puppy and he said his puppy really love these. I will purchase them again when needed.
customer_reviews.author: Queenie

customer_reviews.title: Lots of love to give with little calories
customer_reviews.text: These are a great reward even for a large dog as it gives them a “treat” without a lot of calories

customer_reviews.title: My dog loves them
customer_reviews.text: This is like crack for your dog my dog loves them!
customer_reviews.author: Glen Andrew Hubbard

customer_reviews.title: Dogs like the treats.
customer_reviews.text: These are very tiny bones. Our dogs loved them. They would be great to use for training treats.

customer_reviews.title: Dog barely enjoys them and they give him gas bad gas
customer_reviews.text: Dog barely enjoys them and they give him gas bad gas

customer_reviews.title: My dogs really like these but they are very small.
customer_reviews.text: My Springers love these, just the right size for treats. Of course a few at a time. Nice.
customer_reviews.author: Liz

customer_reviews.title: My dogs love them!
customer_reviews.text: I have a miniature poodle and a dachshund who get a treat every time they go outside to do their business, but I'm concerned about their weight and these treats are the perfect solution! My dogs love them and the treats are very small. I just wish I could find these locally!
customer_reviews.author: Eire

customer_reviews.title: Both my pups love these.
customer_reviews.text: They are great for treats, not too big, not too small. They love the bacon taste. We're very happy with them.
customer_reviews.author: Christine Hanson

customer_reviews.title: 100% will buy again!
customer_reviews.text: Wagging Tails and Happy Dogs here! AWESOME purchase if your dogs likes milkbones!
customer_reviews.author: Cindy

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: My puppy like them. She will deny them when we are out. But I break them in half and use them when training with my girl.
customer_reviews.author: Trevor Williams

customer_reviews.title: Dog Treat Variety Pack
customer_reviews.text: My dogs prefer the gravy flavor, but as typical dogs, will eat anything. LOL It is their evening treat. There are 3 flavors in the package, and they like all of them,
customer_reviews.author: Born on a Monday

customer_reviews.title: It's ok
customer_reviews.text: Our dog has become indifferent to these after awhile. He takes it, but if it falls out of his mouth, he doesn't pick it back up - too much work for a treat that's just "ok" I guess.
customer_reviews.author: James77

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: dogs love these Minis!!!!! Great for training or just a treat

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy

customer_reviews.title: Our dogs love these!
customer_reviews.text: Our dogs love these bones and we love that they’re made locally.

customer_reviews.title: Very nice product
customer_reviews.text: the dog loves these, i will get these again for certain.

customer_reviews.title: Good for training.
customer_reviews.text: My dogs love these little treats. I have 2 labs and I use these to reward good behavior.
customer_reviews.author: Steve Ebersole

customer_reviews.title: Milk-Bone Quality Treats
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size for training and/or keeping my dogs satisfied and at a good weight. Can't go wrong with Milk-Bone biscuit treats.
customer_reviews.author: BarkingDogs

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I got a lot of dogs in the building so the Milk-Bone little mini biscuits is great

customer_reviews.title: Tasty Treats for the Pup
customer_reviews.text: Perfect small treats. Although I have a large dog these are great for the dog walker that treats often.

customer_reviews.title: I was outraged at price for such a tiny box ...
customer_reviews.text: I was outraged at price for such a tiny box. Won't buy again. Thought it was a bigger box for almost $10.
customer_reviews.author: Linda M. Dolan

customer_reviews.title: Puppy Love!
customer_reviews.text: Wanted a treat that is small and not heavy with calories. These mini Milk Bones fit the bill and my pups absolutely love them. Using them as positive reinforcement for housebreaking. Try them your pups will love them too.

customer_reviews.title: Dog loves them!!!
customer_reviews.text: My dog loves these, she loves all of the flavors. Very happy with this product

customer_reviews.title: Riddicks favorite.
customer_reviews.text: My dog loves these. They are a great training treat. My baby is 55# so these are the prefect little biscuit to train with. He loves them so much while I was outside he ate 3/4 of a box!!!!

customer_reviews.title: My small dogs love it
customer_reviews.text: I have two small breed dogs: a Pom and Miniature poodle. Both of these dogs really like these milk bone treats.

customer_reviews.title: Pups love em
customer_reviews.text: My dogs love em! I have have to admit tho that I have never tasted them... :)

customer_reviews.title: Irresistible!
customer_reviews.text: My dog loves these and they smell like real bacon.

customer_reviews.text: This arrived with the safety seal almost completely torn off and with a dried brown residue on the inside of the seal.

customer_reviews.title: Small but tasty (according to my dog)

customer_reviews.title: Milk bone
customer_reviews.text: Received very quickly. It's hard to rate a dog snack -- I don't eat it. But the dogs love them.

customer_reviews.title: Dogs love it

product_meta.title: Milk-Bone Flavor Snacks Dog Treats
product_meta.description: Flavor Name:Bacon| Size:36 oz MiniDogs love bacon almost as much as they love you. So share the love with Milk-Bone mini’s bacon flavor dog treats. With the same teeth-cleaning and vitamin-enriched goodness of Milk-Bone Original Biscuits, you can rest easy knowing your pet is not only getting a mouth-watering, bacon-flavored biscuit but one that is fortified with 12 vitamins and minerals with only 5 calories per treat! and with more than 200 treats to a box, that means you’ll have many happy and healthful Milk-Bone moments your dog will love!.
feature_bullets: 36 Oz Canister With Over 200 Dog Treats
Small Size Dog Biscuits For Frequent, Guilt-Free Treating
Dog Treats Fortified With 12 Vitamins And Minerals And A Delicious Bacon Flavor
